description:
Over 1500 students have already enrolled.

Fully updated for January 2015.

By taking this course you will learn how to jump higher and run faster using Plyometric Training, and best of all you will need no expensive equipment whatsoever!

Plyometric Training is one of the most effective forms of training to improve co-ordination, speed, and power. This course will develop your knowledge of how the body works, enabling you to understand why Plyometric Training is so effective, and show you how to apply it to your training today.

In this course you will learn how to jump higher and run faster using Plyometric Training.

You will learn the history of Plyometric Training, where it originated from, and why professional athletes have used it to improve their power and explosive strength for decades.

You will also learn the science of Plyometric Training, how muscular contraction and the central nervous system play such an important role in generating power and how high you can jump.

You will learn about the Stretch Shortening Cycle and itâ€™s importance to Plyometric Training.

You will be introduced to the importance of programme design, and learn how effective programming can make you more powerful and explosive than you ever imagined.

You will also receive training recommendations that will take your training to the next level.

This course is not a hand written training plan for you to follow, it is a detailed account of the latest research and advice on the effectiveness of Plyometric Training, and how by using it you can improve how high you jump and how fast you can run.

As well as the Udemy 30 day guarantee, you have our promise that you will be wowed and delighted with what you learn in the next 2 hours - you need to get this course now ... right this minute.

Every minute you delay you are missing out ...

Enrol now!
title: How to improve your power and explosive strength.
